task.title: Paying for food and activities
task.shortdesc: Although her parents will provide home cooked meals and dinners out on occasion, Marjan is still responsible for paying for any fun things she does with her friends like going to the movies or downtown.

taskbody.context:
Marjan will pay for herself during spring break using her debit card.
Shopping and dining are some of Marjan's favorite things to do when she visits home.

step.cmd: Check bank account to ensure there are sufficient funds
Ensure debit card is in wallet
